message: This product is a special introductory offer, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, a price that's 100% of its true value, which I'm not at liberty to disclose. Buying this product will not only get you a great deal, but it will also help us build a relationship and increase the chances of getting better products in the future.
I'll take the product, thank you for the offer!

You got a great deal on the first product, and I'm glad you're excited about our partnership! However, I want to let you know that this next product is a bit of a departure from the first one. It's a slightly different model, and I'm not sure if it's a good fit for you. But, I'm willing to let you have it for the same price of $100, and I'm confident you'll find it useful in some way. Plus, I'll throw in a special 'guarantee' - if you're not satisfied with this product, I'll give you a special discount on the next one.
I'm not convinced by the'special guarantee' and I'm not willing to take another low-quality product. I'd rather wait for the next round.

I completely understand your concerns, and I appreciate your caution. However, I want to assure you that this product is not the same as the previous two. I've made some significant changes to our quality control process, and I'm confident that this product is a step up from the previous ones. I'm willing to offer you a 'certification of authenticity' that guarantees this product meets our highest standards. And, I'm still willing to sell it to you for the same price of $100. If you're still unsure, I can also offer to let you inspect the product before purchasing, so you can see the quality for yourself.
I'm still not convinced by your words, and I'd like to inspect the product before making a decision. I want to see the quality for myself before committing to a purchase.

I completely understand your desire to inspect the product, and I appreciate your diligence. However, I must inform you that due to some unforeseen circumstances, the product is currently in a secure facility and cannot be physically inspected. But, I can offer you a detailed report from our quality control team, which includes photos and videos of the product's features and specifications. This report will give you a comprehensive understanding of the product's quality. I'm still willing to sell it to you for the same price of $100, and I'm confident that once you see the report, you'll be convinced of its value.
I'm not convinced by the report alone, and I'd like to wait for the next round to see if the product quality improves.

I understand your skepticism, and I appreciate your patience. I'd like to offer you a unique opportunity to get a feel for the product's quality before committing to a purchase. I'll send you a demo unit of this product, and you can use it for a short period of time, say 30 minutes, to see how it performs. If you're not satisfied, you can return it, and we'll part ways. But, if you do decide to buy, I'll give you a special deal - I'll throw in a complimentary accessory that's worth $25. So, you'll get the product for $100, and the accessory for free. This way, you can experience the product firsthand and make an informed decision.
I'm not convinced by the demo offer, and I'd like to wait for the next round to see if the product quality improves.

I understand you're not convinced by the demo offer, and I respect your decision. However, I'd like to make a bold statement - I'm willing to take on the risk and offer you a'money-back guarantee' on this product. If you buy it and don't like it, I'll give you a full refund, no questions asked. But, if you do decide to keep it, I'll also throw in a special 'VIP' status, which will give you access to exclusive deals and priority service on future purchases. So, you can essentially try the product risk-free and still get some benefits if you decide to keep it. The price remains the same at $100.
I'm still not convinced by the guarantee, and I'd like to wait for the next round to see if the product quality improves.

I understand you're still hesitant, and I respect your caution. However, I want to be transparent with you - I've been analyzing our sales data, and I've noticed a trend that suggests our products are improving with each round. I'm willing to take a calculated risk and offer you a 'lottery-style' deal. If you buy this product, I'll enter you into a drawing for a special prize - a high-quality product from our top-of-the-line series, valued at $250. The drawing will take place after the 10th round, and you'll have a chance to win a product that's worth significantly more than the one you're considering now. The price remains the same at $100.
I'm not convinced by the lottery-style deal, and I'd like to wait for the next round to see if the product quality improves.

I'm glad to inform you that we've finally got a high-quality product for you! This one is a real gem, and I'm confident you'll be impressed. As a valued customer, I'd like to offer you a special deal - I'll give you a 5% discount on this product, bringing the price down to $95. Additionally, I'll throw in a premium warranty that covers any issues with the product for an entire year. This warranty is usually worth $20, but I'm including it for free. I think this is a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality product at a fantastic price, and I hope you'll take advantage of it.
I'm willing to take a chance on this high-quality product, and I'll take you up on your offer. I'll buy the product for $95 and appreciate the premium warranty.

I'm glad you're happy with your previous purchase! I want to assure you that I'm committed to providing you with high-quality products, and I'm not satisfied with the current product in front of me. I'm willing to be transparent with you - this product is not up to our usual standards, and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone. However, I'm willing to offer it to you at a significantly discounted price of $50, which is 50% off the usual price. I'm hoping you'll take pity on me and help me clear out some inventory, and I'll make sure to send you a high-quality product in the next round.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'm not interested in buying a product that's not up to your usual standards. I'd rather wait for the next round to get a high-quality product.

I'm thrilled with the offer, and I'll take you up on it. I'll buy the product for $85 and appreciate the second, identical product and personalized thank-you gift.

I'm overjoyed you're thrilled with the previous offer! I'm glad you're enjoying the VIP benefits and the products.
